title: webdav error using curl with ssl
body:
when i goto the admin page i get the following error message: "your web server is not yet properly setup to allow files synchronization because the webdav interface seems to be broken. please double check the installation guides."

looking at the error log, the corresponding entry is:

    iswebdavworking: no - reason: exception 'sabre_dav_exception' with message '[curl] error while making request: ssl certificate problem, verify that the ca cert is ok. details: error:14090086:ssl routines:ssl3_get_server_certificate:certificate verify failed (error code: 60)' in /home/jonny/websites/cloud/owncloud/3rdparty/sabre/dav/client.php:410 stack trace: #0 /home/jonny/websites/cloud/owncloud/3rdparty/sabre/dav/client.php(179): sabre_dav_client->request('propfind', '', '<?xml version="...', array) #1 /home/jonny/websites/cloud/owncloud/lib/util.php(593): sabre_dav_client->propfind('', array) #2 /home/jonny/websites/cloud/owncloud/settings/admin.php(34): oc_util::iswebdavworking() #3 /home/jonny/websites/cloud/owncloud/lib/route.php(113) : runtime-created function(1): require_once('/home/jonny/web...') #4 [internal function]: __lambda_func(array) #5 /home/jonny/websites/cloud/owncloud/lib/router.php(127): call_user_func('?lambda_213', array) #6 /home/jonny/websites/cloud/owncloud/lib/base.php(608): oc_router->match('/settings/admin') #7 /home/jonny/websites/cloud/owncloud/index.php(28): oc::handlerequest() #8 {main}

having a look at some other issues and trying out some boilerplate curl code myself this is definitely an issue with curl itself. one that can be fixed by passing the option `curlopt_ssl_verifypeer:false` to curl. this appears to be an option in the sabredav code. specifically lines 323-325 in `client.php`.

so why am i still getting an error?
